Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Cozy & Basic”

Reviews.Content: stayed november perfect tube covent garden leicester square china town etc bathroom basic staff friendly helpful breakfast nice cooked bar evening meals didnt bother eat loads fabulous restaurants windows night awful lot noise night suppose expect rating location staff

Reviews.Title: “Location, location, location”

Reviews.Content: fantastic location easily accessible heathrow tube changeover tube lines reception staff friendly couldnt request adhered quickly smile breakfast adequate cooked english breakfast available freshly cooked near british museum theatres oxford street minutes walk safe quiet location sainsburys nearby bring home

Reviews.Content: wide mixture reviews hotel location pretty perfect central london sits nice quiet street building looks nice outside arrived late booking hotel clerk helpful friendly top floor cosy stayed hotel bit tired creates nice school atmosphere price type hotel average overall satisfied hotel stay

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”

Reviews.Content: main hotel location street british museum minutes walk covent garden loads pubs eateries secondly staff extremely helpful friendly downside hotel bit tired missing tiles torn carpets dubious bedsprings bit cramped spotlessly clean shower plenty clean fresh towels
